content: this legal text summarizes the progress of a cause that took place in antwerp in july 2018 the procedure lasted for 3 years and 2 months the case involves two parties referred to as db and cr with lawyers fg and if representing them the judges decision is about the right to allocate the family home during a division proceeding the court states that this right can be waived and can be reevaluated even if the propertys value has changed since neither party wanted the property preferentially the court orders its sale through an auction the court dismisses the wifes claim for damages the text also mentions an update that needs to be carried out overall the court orders the sale of the property and finds the husbands claim for damages unfounded
